channel.title: CVE Feed for iTux -- Post Index
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iTux -- Post Index

item.title: CVE-2021-34637|2024-08-04T00:19:47.883Z -- itux -- post%20index
item.description: The Post Index WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the OptionsPage function found in the ~/php/settings.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.7.5.
